input:
The detective revealed an anomaly in the case.  so... 
Choose between:
- He finalized his theory.
- He scrapped his theory.

The judge pounded the gavel.  because... 
Choose between:
- The courtroom broke into uproar.
- The jury announced its verdict.

I twisted the cap off the soda bottle.  so... 
Choose between:
- The soda fizzed.
- The soda leaked out.

The flame on the candle went out.  because... 
Choose between:
- I blew on the wick.
- I put a match to the wick.
pred: i put a match to the wick.
